resources.string: Hey There! Looks like you have denied location permission. We dont do that here 🙂 Not cool 🙂 Please enable your location settings.
Please enable GPS. Otherwise, we cannot proceed 😩 😭
Please select \"Permissions\" and allow the required permissions. 🙂🙂🙂🙂🙂
There is a problem with your internet connection! Please try to reconnect. 🙂
We got an eye on you 🧐
Are you🧐 trying to sneak out? 😈 \n Enable your GPS RIGHT NOW or you will be missing out on so much ! 👎👎
Stay at home with us and save the world 😌
